I kat ova 2000 pipol long 13 komuniti blong West Gaua mo 30% nomo oli kat full akses long helt seves blong Womal klinik.
Nes blong Womal klinik, Fancy Rolen hemi talem se olgeta mein jalenj hemi i nogat transport, i nogat rod blong trak, i nogat network mo longfala rod blong sikman i mas travel blong kasem dispenseri.
Hemi talem tu se blong karem ol sikman long bak hemi wan praktis blong long taem from nomo se i nogat transport mo blong karem bot hemi sas tumas.
Infomesen se aot long 13 komuniti ia i kat 3 komunit nomo we oli stap aksesem seves blong helt from ol sikman save wokbaot kolosap nomo blo kasem.
Mrs Rolen hemi stap mekem ol Outreach prokram blong visitim ol sik man long evri 13 komuniti stat long Dorig kasem long Matana long West Gaua.
Plante long ol mama ia taem oli pregnant oli no karem ol tritmen long klinik from i nogat rod blong trak mo Womal dispenseri i nogat bot blong visitim olgeta.
“Fulap long ol mama blong mifala oli bonem bebe aot saed long klinik,” hemi talem.
“Ol piknini anda long 0 – 1 yia mifala nosave kasem namba blong olgeta from tete ol mama oli pregnant nomo long vilej mo oli bonem bebe long vilej.”
Nes hemi talem se ol vaccine blong ol pikinini blong karem evri manis hemi no posibol tu.
Mrs Rolen hemi stap askem Kavman tru long Ministri blong Helt blong fundem Womal dispenseri wetem wan transport olsem bot blong save helpem hem long Outreach prokram blong helpem ol sikman long ol nara vilej.
By Mika Albie

Prime Minista Bob Loughman I talem se palemen bae i tokbaot issue blong use blong social media long palemen sisen, we I start long yestete.
Hemi mekem toktok ia, long taem we hemi stap respond long toktok blong president long yesetet morning.
PM Loughman I talem se palemen bae I no save stopem use blong social media, be bae gavman I traem blong putum sam samting blong pipol I yusum social media long wan wei we I helpem nara wan.
Hemi talem se evri citizen blong kantri ia I kat right blong talem tinktink blong olgeta mo fasin blong haed bihaen ol kiaman fez blong toktok bae i kat control long hem.
Bill we I tokbaot social media hemi bill blong cyber crime we I stap insaed long list blong 14 bill blong gavman we bae palemen I tok raon long hem start long tete I ko.

Na ol i wokim kem klostu long maunten Sainai. 3Moses i go antap long dispela maunten bilong toktok wantaim God. Orait Bikpela i stap long maunten na i singaut long Moses na i tokim em long givim sampela tok long ol Israel, em ol lain tumbuna bilong Jekop. 4Bikpela i tok olsem, “Yupela i lukim pinis ol samting mi bin mekim long ol I

Sapos wanpela man o wanpela abus i kalapim mak, orait yupela i mas kilim em long dispela pasin. I gat wanpela taim tasol yupela i mas i go antap long maunten. Long taim yupela i harim biugel i krai, orait yupela i mas i go.” 14Orait 
... (1569 chars skipped) ...
m, yu yet yu bin givim strongpela tok long mipela. Na mipela i putim mak i raunim arere bilong maunten, na mipela i tok pinis olsem, dispela maunten i tambu.” 24Orait Bikpela i bekim tok long em olsem, “I orait, yu go daun na kisim Aron i kam antap wantaim yu. Tasol ol pris na ol manmeri i no ken kalapim mak na kam long mi antap long maunten. Sapos ol i mekim olsem, bai mi mekim save long ol.” 25Moses i harim dispela tok na em i go daun long ol manmeri na autim olgeta tok Bikpela i bin givim em.

Jisas Krais i tokim ol disaipel bilong em olsem: “Lait bilong yupela i mas stap ples klia long ai bilong ol man, na bai ol inap lukim ol gutpela wok bilong yupela na givim glori long Papa bilong yupela long heven.” (Matyu 5:16) Bilong mekim olsem, mipela i save mekim gutpela wok long teknoloji, na Intenet tu. Web-sait bilong mipela long Intenet, jw.org, i givim save long ol man long ol bilip na wok bilong ol Witnes Bilong Jehova. Wanem ol samting i stap long dispela Web-sait?
Ol bekim bilong Bai

g winim 100 tokples na i gat planti buk bilong stadi long Baibel, olsem buk Tru Tru Baibel i Tok Wanem? na ol nupela Wastaua na Kirap!x Yu inap ritim o harim rekoding bilong planti bilong ol dispela buk na nius, na tu, yu ken daunlodim long odio, PDF o EPUB format. Yu inap prinim tu sampela pes na givim long wanpela man long tokples bilong em yet! I gat ol buk na nius i stap long vidio long planti tokples sain. Yu inap daunlodim Baibel ritim, ol Baibel drama, na ol naispela musik bilong yu ken h

Long ol dispela rot, mipela i mekim lait bilong tok i tru i kamap klia long ol longwe hap bilong graun. Ol manmeri bilong olgeta kontinen, na Antaktika tu, i kisim helpim. Mipela i beten olsem “tok bilong Jehova i ken wok yet long spit i go” long olgeta hap bilong graun, bilong litimapim nem bilong God.—2 Tesalonaika 3:1.
Olsem wanem jw.org i helpim planti manmeri moa long kisim save long tok i tru bilong Baibel?
Yu laik lukim wanem samting long Web-sait bilong mipela?

Bai mi bagarapim olgeta na olgeta bai i stap nating. Olsem na bai olgeta manmeri i save gut, mi yet mi Bikpela.”

Job
Wotfo Gudbala Pipul Abum Trabul?
Wal dijan det stori blanga det olmen neim Job. God bin larram Seitin testimbat im brabli adbalawei. Imbin lujim ol im ebrijing en ol im san en doda olabat du, en imbin jidan brabli sikwan men du. Job bin sabi God nomo bin panishim im, bat im thribala fren bin reken God bin panishim im dumaji imbin dum brabli nogudbala ting. Bambai God bin meigim olabat sabi oni im na sabi ebrijing. Wal Job bin kipgon trastimbat God langa gudtaim en langa adtaim en im nomo bin
... (1738 chars skipped) ... 
 tok, “Wal wotfo im oldei abum loda rispek langa yu? Dumaji yu oldei lukaftum langa im brabli gudwei. 10 Yu jis laik det bigwan wol weya oldei stapam pipul brom ardimbat im, en nomo oni im, bat holot im bigininimob, en ol im kantri du. Yu oldei meigim im brabli haibala blanga ola gudbala ting im oldei dumbat, en ol im enimulmob oldei jidan ebriweya. 11 Bat if yu deigimwei ola ebrijing brom im, wal im garra tok nogudbalawei rait langa yu feis.” Lagijat na det nogudwan einjul bin tok.✡ Reb 12:10
1
... (1738 chars skipped) ...
bin irrim ol dislot nyus imbin breigim im klos en sheibum im hed, dumaji imbin brabli nogudbinji. En imbin nildan langa graun en imbin weship langa God. 21 En imbin tok,
“Ai nomo bin bringimap enijing wen aibin bon,
en ai kaan deigim enijing langa greibyad wen ai dai.
Oni YAWEI imselp bin gibit mi ol detlot ebrijing,
en YAWEI na bin deigimwei ola ebrijing.
Preisim det neim blanga YAWEI.”
22 Nomeda ol detlot ting bin hepin langa Job, im nomo bin tok nogudbala ting, en im nomo bin bleim langa God.

WAJTAOA (STADI) SEPTEMBA 2014
Long Wajtaoa ya i gat ol stadi long wik blong 27 Oktoba kasem 30 Novemba 2014.
Haf ya bambae i tokbaot sam risen, we i mekem plante man oli agri se ol Witnes blong Jehova oli holem trutok. Mo tu, bambae yumi luk ol risen we i mekem sam Witnes oli bilif strong se oli faenem trutok.
Yumi evri wan i kasem ol trabol, from we yumi stap long wol blong Setan. ?Wanem sam rod we Setan i yusum blong agensem yumi? ?Olsem wanem yumi save rere from ol trabol ya we bambae oli kam?
Papa mo mama i gat wok ya ‘blong stretem olgeta mo tijim olgeta olsem we Jehova i wantem.’ (Efesas 6:4) Stadi ya bambae i tokbaot tri rod we ol papa mo mama oli save folem blong lukaot gud long ol pikinini blong olgeta, mo givhan long olgeta blong oli lavem Jehova.
Ded mo ol narafala trabol oli mekem yumi harem nogud tumas. ?From wanem ol man oli ded? ?Olsem wanem God bambae i winim las enemi ya ded, blong olwe? (1 Korin 15:26) I gud yu luk olsem wanem ansa blong ol kwestin ya i soemaot se Jehova i gat stret fasin, i waes mo i gat lav.
Plante man we oli mekem wok blong Jehova fultaem oli wok strong. ?Yu save mekem wanem blong yu tingbaot ‘fasin blong olgeta blong soemaot bilif,’ mo fasin blong olgeta we i ‘soemaot we oli lavem God tumas?

An Josef hemi kolem pikinini ya Jisas.

I go long Fas Presidensi blong Jos blong Jisas Kraes blong Ol Lata-dei Sent
Ol Dia Brata: Olsem we i stap long revelesen long Seksen 120 long Doktrin mo Ol Kavenan, Kaonsel we i lukaotem mane blong Taeting i givim raet blong spendem ol mane blong Jos. Kaonsel ia, insaed i gat Fas Presidensi, Kworom blong Olgeta Twelef Aposol, mo Prisaeding Bisoprik.
Kaonsel ia, i apruvum ol bajet blong ol Jos dipatmen mo ol wok blong Jos mo ol aktiviti we i go wetem ol eklesiastik yunit. Afta we oli kasem raet l
... (17 chars skipped) ... 
l dipatmen blong Jos oli spendem mane ia folem bajet we oli apruvum mo i go stret wetem ol bajet we oli apruvum mo wetem ol polisi mo ol fasin blong wok blong Jos.
Jos Odit Dipatmen i bin gat raet blong gotru long evri rekod mo sistem blong oli save jekem mo kontrolem ol risit blong mane we oli spendem, fasin blong spendem mane mo lukaotem gud ol propeti we Jos i gat. Jos Odit Dipatmen i wan independen bodi aot long ol narafala dipatmen mo operesen blong Jos mo ol staf we oli wok insaed i gat ol
... (17 chars skipped) ...
l odita, infomesen sistem odita we oli kwalifae mo ol narafala kwalifae man.
Folem wok we odita i bin mekem, Jos Odit Dipatmen i wantem givimaot se, long saed blong evri samting we Jos i gat, ol kontribusen we oli bin kasem, ol mane we oli bin spendem, mo ol propeti we Jos i gat blong yia 2012, oli bin rekodem mo yusum folem stret fasin blong lukaot mane, wetem ol bajet, mo ol Jos polisi mo fasin blong wok we oli apruvum.
Mi givim wetem respek,
Jos Odit Dipatmen
Robet W. Konwel

Eitpla memba blong femili blong despla Hamas lida ibin dai bihaen long Israel ibin sutim wanpla roket bom na bagarapim tripla storey haus long Gaza siti long wiken.
Planti kantri long wold nau iwok long toktok strong long Hamas na Israel long stopim pastem ol fait em tupla saed wantem iwok long mekim egensim wanpla narapla insaet long despla faifpla dei igo pinis.
Despla roket bom ibin bagarapim tru despla haus blong Dalu family, na ol helt ofisa itok, fopla meri, na fopla pikinini ibin dai long en.
Tokman blong ol laen militari blong Israel itok, oli bin makim na sutim despla roket bom igo stret long haus blong Yihia Abayah, husat i wok olsem wanpla sinia komanda blong Hamas long Gaza Strip.
Praim Minista blong Israel Benjamin Netanyahu ibin tokim ol lida blong ol narapla kantri olsem Israel iwok long traem hard tru long noken kilim ol sivilian pipal long despla fait emi wok long mekim egensim Hamas.
Tasol ol laen army blong Hamas itok olsem, bai oli bekim iet despla pasin em Israel ibin mekim long kilim Dalu famili.
Ol helt ofisa long Gaza itok samting olsem 69 pipal blong Palestine ibin dai na planti handrat ol narapla ibin kisim bagarap bihaen long Israel ibin bomim Gaza strip.
Planti long ol despla pipal husat ibin dai em ol meri na ol pikinini.
ABC/Reuters

Kavman i kleim se infomesen blong pablik akaons i no tru
Kavman i talem se infomesen we Public Accounts Committee i rilisim abaot tu bank i pul aot long National Bank blong Vanuatu from mani laundering mo citizenship hemi no tru.
Minister blong Finance mo Economic Management, Johnny Koanapo, i talem se ol infomesen we Public Accounts Committee i rilisim long wik ia hemi wan misinfomesen mo pablik i no sud harem.
Public Accounts Committee i bin ripotem se tufala bank, Westpac mo National Bank blo
... (1027 chars skipped) ... 
l sapot.
“Corresponding banking isu hemi nokat eni koneksen nating wetem paspot isiu so hem ia hemi wan misinfomesen,” hemi talem.
Jeaman blong Public Accounts Committee, Matai Seremaiah, i talem se folem inkwaeri we oli bin mekem i soem se tufala bank ia i bin givim notis finis long National Bank blong Vanuatu blong tufala i pulaot olsem ol correspondent bank.
Hemi talem se Westpac i pulaot nomo from i gat lukluk se citizenship program i gat hae risk blong save brijim ol anti mani laundering lo
... (1027 chars skipped) ...
m ol nara corresponding bank blong dil wetem mani blong citizenship bifo i entarem kaontri.
Governor Athy i talem se Reserve Bank blong Vanuatu bai i help blong mekem sapot statemen long eni bank we i wiling blong mekem bisnis wetem National Bank blong Vanuatu.
Sins long January i kam, Ofis blong Citizenship i mekem finis VT 8.9 billion long program ia mbe plan blong kavman hemi blong mekem VT9 billion.
VBTC i no bin save kasem wan respon long jeaman blong Citizenship from hemi no bin availabol.

Waswe, iu readim olketa Wastaoa magasin wea iumi kasem no longtaem go nomoa and ting raonem samting wea iu readim? Trae for ansarem olketa kwestin hia:
Wanem kaen sin nao Jesus storyim long kaonsel wea stap long Matthew 18:15-17?
Jesus story abaotem olketa problem wea savve kamap midolwan tufala Christian, and wea tufala seleva fit for stretem. Nomata olsem, diswan hem kaen sin wea man savve disfellowship long hem sapos man wea duim sin hem no laek for followim disfala kaonsel bilong Jesus. Olse
... (1340 chars skipped) ... 
amting, nomata olketa man wea raetem and copyim Bible iusim papyrus and parchment, Bible hem no rotten. Mek-tu samting, staka bigman long gavman and bilong religion trae for distroem Bible, bat olketa no savve duim datwan. And mek-thri samting, nomata pipol trae for changem message long Bible, olketa no win for duim datwan.—wp16.4, p. 4-7.
Wanem nao samfala samting wea wanfala Christian savve duim for mekem laef bilong hem simpol?
Raetem list bilong olketa samting wea iu needim, and no baem samt
... (1340 chars skipped) ...
tap long hem, wea storyim “haos bilong David.” Ples wea David killim dae Goliath wea Bible storyim hem really stap.—wp16.5, p. 13.
Long wanem wei nao savve, wei for minim samting, and wisdom olketa difren?
Man wea savve long wanfala samting hem mas kasem information abaotem datfala samting. Man wea minim samting hem luksavve hao wanfala samting hem join witim nara samting. Bat man wea hem wise hem iusim savve wea hem garem, witim wei wea hem minim samting for duim gudfala samting.—w16.10, p. 18.

Long east saed long Sea long Galilee, Jesus duim mirakol for feedim staka thousand pipol and then hem ranawe taem olketa laek for mekem hem king. Long datfala naet Jesus wakabaot antap long sea wea raf and hem sevem Peter, wea hem tu wakabaot antap long sea, bat taem hem daot hem start for sink daon. Jesus mekem wind tu for kwaet. Sapos nomoa, maet olketa disaepol shiprek nao.
Jesus kam bak nao long west saed long Sea long Galilee, klosap long Capernaum. Pipol wea Jesus duim mirakol for feedim o
... (1326 chars skipped) ... 
ld kasem laef.” From olketa no minim hem, olketa sei: “Lord, mifala laekem iu for givim mifala disfala bred olowe.” (John 6:32-34) Wanem nao disfala “bred” wea Jesus storyim?
Hem sei: “Mi nao datfala bred wea mekem pipol laef. Man wea kam long mi bae no hangre moa, and man wea showimaot faith long mi bae no need for drink moa. Mi talem iufala finis, nomata iufala lukim mi bat iufala no biliv long mi. . . . Mi kam daon from heven, no for duim samting wea miseleva laekem bat for duim samting wea D
... (1326 chars skipped) ...
owimaot faith long [spesol son bilong God] hem no dae bat kasem laef olowe.” (John 3:15, 16) Bat distaem hem story witim staka pipol and talem olketa hem bae duim samting for mekem olketa kasem laef olowe, wea datfala manna and datfala bred long Galilee no savve duim. So hao nao bae man kasem laef olowe? Jesus sei moa: “Mi nao datfala bred wea mekem pipol laef.”—John 6:48.
Disfala story abaotem bred from heven hem gohed, and hem kamap big moa taem Jesus teach long wanfala sinagog long Capernaum.

Ola braja blanga Josef bin go langa Ijip
1 Wal imbin brabli drai langa det kantri weya Jeikob bin jidan, en wen olabat bin ranat blanga daga, Jeikob bin gedim wed weya deibin abum daga langa det kantri gulum Ijip.
Wal Jeikob bin dalim im san olabat, “Wotrong garram yumob? 2 Yumob go langa Ijip en baiyim daga blanga wi bambai wi dai.”✡ Eks 7:12
3 Brom deya det tenbala braja blanga Josef bin ol go langa Ijip blanga baiyim daga. 4 Bat Jeikob nomo bin larram Benjamin det ful braja blanga Josef go
... (2699 chars skipped) ... 
jan trabul bin kaman langa wi dumaji wibin dum det nogudbala ting langa wi braja bifo. Wen imbin apset en imbin kipgon askimbat wi blanga larramgo im, wi nomo bin lisin langa im. En wi garram dijan bedlak na dumaji wibin dum lagijat langa im.”
22 Wal Rubin bin dalim im braja olabat, “Aibin dalim yumob nomo blanga ardim det boi. Bat yumob nomo bin lisin langa mi. En dijan na peiyimbek wi weya wibin binijimof im.”✡ Jen 37:21,22
23 Wal wen deibin tok lagijat, dei nomo bin sabi Josef bin andasten de
... (2699 chars skipped) ...
aftum Benjamin. En if ai nomo bringimbek im langa yu, wal yu gin peiyimbek mi. Yu gin binijimap det dubala lilboi main. Yu nomo wori blanga Benjamin. Ai garra bringimbek im langa yu.”
38 Bat Jeikob bin tok, “Nomo! Ai kaan larram im go garram yu. Det braja blanga im bin dai, en im na det laswan boi blanga im mami. Enijing mait hepin langa im langa roud. En if ai gedim bednyus weya imbin dai, wal ai garra jidan nogudbinji detmatj, en ai garra dai du, dumaji mi olmen na.” Lagijat na Jeikob bin tok.

Presiden blong Tafea Futbol Asosiesen, Iau Tuan Naukoot emi kam niufala vaes presiden blong Vanuatu Futbol Federesen afta long kongres i sitaon long Luganville las wik blong jusum hem. Iau hemi kat 49 year mo hemi bin ple long Tafea FC long Port Vila lik bifo olsem wan straeka, mo tu, emi bin ple long …
Vanuatu Football Federation kongres long Luganville las wik emi pasem wan niufala format blong Nasonal Supa Lik blong akomodetem 2 spot blong i go insaed long ‘O-League’. I no long taem nating Oceania Football Confederation i jenisim fomat blong ‘Oceania Champions League’ o O-Lik blong alaoem tu club i save ripresentem wan kantri insaed long Oceania …
‘Province of Origin’ we oli okanaesem long Port Vila mo Luganville long las manis i soem se Provins blong Shefa mo Malampa tufala i strong long saed blong futbol long Vanuatu. Tufala seperet tunamen ia i no semak, mo long Port Vila, Vanuatu Futbol Federesen nao i okanaesem wetem sponsasip blong Port Vila Municipality we Shefa …
‘Northern Region Football Academy’ we hemi wan ‘sub-centre’ blong VFF long noten rijen bae hemi open nekis wik long namba 1 disemba 2015 emia long ‘Luganville Soccer City Stadium’ long Santo.
Z1 band will entertain live today Friday 6th November 2015 at Seafront stage for the official launching of Digicel Sponsorship towards Amicale FC. The band consisting mostly of Naio band members is performing with famous Zaddock and new talent songstress Dalinda.

Pablik Seves Comisen (PSC) bae i mas pem kolosap Vt900,000 i ko long wan wokman we PSC i bin sakemaot hem.
Suprim Kot i faenem se aksen blong PSC blong sakemaot woka ia hemi no folem law mo PSC i mas pem aot kontrak blong hem.
PSC hemi bin apointem Gordon Arnhambat olsem Nasonal Kodineta blong Lands Management Unit long Febuari namba 13.
Apointmen ia hemi blong wan kontrak blong 3 manis be PSC hemi teminatem long Mei namba 14, 2023.
Mr Arnhambat hemi mekem wan klem blong PSC i mas pem kontrak blong hem mo kot i rul long feiva blong hem long wan disisen we kamaot long las wik.
Kot i faenemaot se PSC i mekem disisen blong revokem apointmen ia from Mr Arnhambat hemi bin konvikted long wan kriminal kes long Magistrate Kot.
PSC i klem tu se nomata long apointmen leta, Arnhambat i no saenem eni kontrak wetem PSC.
Nomata we PSC Act i alaoem blong Comisen i save terminate sapos man i gat kriminol konviksen, Suprim Kot Jaj Oliver Saksak i talem se Section 36 blong Act ia i talem se bae i mas gat wan disiplinary board i lukluk long isu olsem.
Long kes blong Arnhambat, i nogat eni disiplinary board i sitaon blong lukluk long hem.
Amaon we PSC i mas pem long Mr Arnhambat hemi inkludum 3 manis salari, 14 dei notis, mo 6 taem severens pay from terminesen blong hem ino stret.

Six foma Prime Minista blong kontest -Snap eleksen
Six foma Prime Minista bambae oli kontestem 2022 snap eleksen long October.
Olgeta ia i gat Sato Kilman Liftuvanu, Moana Carcasses Kalosil, Charlot Salwai Tabimasmas, Joe Iaukowai Natuman, Rialuth Serge Vohor mo keateka Prime Minista Bob Loughman Weibur.
Ol lida ia i kleim se pipol i askem olgeta bageken blong oli mas go bak long palemen mo finisim ol wok we oli bin stap tokbaot.

“Mi bin vinisim gud saspen sentens blong mi, mo long 2021 Head blong State hemi padonem ol conviksen so i minim se mi fri. Mo ol pipol i wantem mi kobak blong vinisim term blong me.”

Evri foma Praem Minista ia oli stap long Port Vila long wik ia mo finalisem form blong olketa blong kontestem snap eleksen.

Vanuatu weightlifting tim we oli ko tekem pat long Commonwealth weightlifting 2024 senia, junia mo yut jampionsip long Fiji, taem Thomas Wilbur hemi manej blong sekiurim bronze medl blong Vanuatu.
Hemi wan mo excitmen wik blong sport long rijen bakeken, taem i lukim Fiji hemi hostem long las wik 2024 Commonwealth jampionship blong senia, junia mo yut, we i karem samples 300 atlit long wol we oli kam tugeta blong patisipet.
Vanuatu hemi kat 3 patisipen we oli ko tekem pat long taem ia, i kat Aja Prichard Lolo hemi long womans katekori blong 81kg, Thomas Wilbur long mens katekori long 109 kg mo Milah Dihn long womans katekori blong 64kg.
Aot long 3fala atlit blong Vanuatu, i lukim Atja mo Thomas tufala i ripresentem Vanuatu long plante kompetisens mo jampionsip long rijen mo ovasi, olsem Commonwealth kems las yia mo Atja hemi kasem Olympic kem long yia ia.
Mo long manis ia Milah hemi akompai tufala i ko long Commonwealth weightlifting long Fiji.
Tenaot blong Vanuatu long taem ia, i lukim Thomas Wilbur hemi karem brons blong mens senia katekori, Aja mo Mila i klokem wan pesonal bes blong tufala long kompetisen ia.
Hemi wan wik kompetisen we i stat long mande las wik kasem long Fridei ia.

Samting ya i mekem se oli naf blong holemstrong long bilif blong olgeta, mo oli faenemaot se laef blong olgeta i gat mining.

Tok Glosa em wanpela kain olsem tok-ples ikam long Interglossa. Buk bilong Tok Glosa i kamap long yia 1978. Nem blong tokples em i kamap long rup bilong Graik, "glossa", i stap tokautim "tongue" o "language".
Bilong olsem tokples konstruktem, Tok Glosa i no gat kaikai long tokples, na spelin i holim tru tru na i fonetik olsem. Olsem tokples konstruktem, i no gat infleksen, na tok i stap long diksenari for oltaim, no gat wanem olsem funksen em i stap long toksen. Olsem i no klia long konteks, gra
... (4773 chars skipped) ... 
tapped" (toktokman i liklik tasol i tupim toktokman long tupela lupela i stap long raitim mous), i no ken stap mekim olsem uvularized.
Wanpraktis blong toktokim N bifo wan velar saund (g o k) olsem ŋ emi i no wanpela prefarem, tasol, i usim planti taim blong mekim tingting blong tokples i simplifai. X emi save mekim saund 'z' long stat blong wod, tasol hemi i no prefarem.
Sapos wan nem blong foren i no save usim olsem letas blong Tok Glosa blong mekim olsem spelin blong nem i stap bifo."

Genarali, ol kirapim rulis em i aplikim long bikpla wok long mekim nupla toksave long Tok Glosa.[1] Olgeta bikpla wod i stap strongpela (tasol ol i save kukim olsem spesifikasion prefiks) i stap karamapim (olsem "an", "fe", o "pe").
Indefinit wod bai stap olsem oli bin (ad, de, si, kata).

Kot bae hemi mekem wan desisen tumoro sapos President blong National United Pati, Bruno Leingkone hemi stil save stap olsem wan memba blong Palemen mo wet long wan petisen we istap bifo long Supreme Kot.
Mr Leingkone hemi mekem aplikesen ia tedei afta we Spika blong Palemen Seoule Simeon hemi mekem wan desisen long Mandei blong aotem Mr Leingkone olsem memba blong Palemen.
Spika Seoule i talem long Mandei se Mr Leingkone hemi no gat permisen blong no atendem 3 konsecutif siting blong Palemen.
Stay oda we Mr Leingkone hemi aplae from ia, hemi blong wet long hearing blong petisen we Mr Leingkone hemi putum long Supreme Kot blong harem legaliti blong desisen blong Spika.
Petisen we Mr Leingkone i putum bae Supreme Kot i harem long Fraede namba 29 Septemba.
Lawya blong Mr Leingkone, Justin Ngwele, i talem se sapos we stay oda ino ko tru, ol pipol blong Ambrym mo constituency bae save stap olsem ol disadvantage vota.
Garry Blake, lawya blong Spika, i talem long kot se Mr Leingkone, i no act stret mo hemi bin save finis long Mandei se jea blong hem i vacate, be hemi no bin resaen olsem wan minista.

WAN SAED LEG BLONG LUSIA I NOGUD. Taem Lusia i smol, hem i kasem strong sik ya polio, we i save pas i go long narafala man, mo i spolem ol nev long bodi. S.I GAVMAN I LAIKIM BILL OF RIGHTS LONG NUPELA MAMA LO.
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, Aug. 14) - Solomon Islands Minista i lukautim Provinsal Gavman i tok, gavman i laikim Bill of rights bilong kantri i stap insait long nupela mama lo.
Dorothy Wickham i ripot ikam long Honiara olsem, Walter Naezon ibin tokim Radio Australia long wanpela toktok bilong em olsem, ol i nau mas gat Bill of rights insait long mama lo bilong kantri.
Em i bin tokaut tu olsem, dispela bai luksave tu long Chief sistem na sampela pasin bilong kalsa long kantri.
Naezon i tok, ol i ting Kebinet bai givim tok orait long en long mun Sptember bihain long ol toktok long en ipinis na putim igo long palamen long mun November.
August 14, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra

Caretaker praem minista blong Solomon Islands, Manasseh Sogavare hem se politikol stabiliti nao hem risin wae Coalition Gavman blong hem hem bin stap namem kantri long kolsap 5 fala yia, and olketa duim plande developmemnt long kantri insaet long disfala taem.
Mr Sogavare hemn se narafala big samting wea Democratic Coalition Government for Advancement gavman blongem ibin mekem hem long saet long Geo-politiks blong kantri wea hem lukim plande developmen ikamap bihaen kantri hem lusim Taiwan and luksave long China.
Hem mekem disfala toktok long wanfala exclussive interview wantaim Georgina Kekea blong Tavuli News long Pangoe long East Choiserul Constituency blong hem, bihaem olketa mekem hem olsem bigfala chief afta hem stap olsem Memba blong olketa long Palamen fo 27 yia.
Mr Sogavare hem se tu olsem melwan long olketa bigfala salens blong Gavman blong hem, hem disfala issue blong China an Taiwan, Covid-19 pandemic, an disfala 2021 riot long Honiara.
Long audio bae iu herem lelebet long stori blong Gina Kekea blong Tavuli News wetem Mr Sogavare.

Yes. Man savve duim datwan long tufala wei:
Ask for finis. Man savve raetem leta or talem mifala hem no laek for gohed olsem wanfala Jehovah’s Witness.
Samting hem duim. Man savve duim samting wea showimaot hem no laek for gohed olsem wanfala Jehovah’s Witness. (1 Peter 5:9) Olsem example, maet hem joinim nara religion and talemaot hem bae gohed for member bilong datfala religion.—1 John 2:19.
Waswe sapos man hem stop for preach and for attendim olketa meeting bilong iufala? Bae iu sei hem finis for olsem wanfala Jehovah’s Witness?
Nomoa. Maet faith bilong man hem kamap wik nomoa. Plande taem, olketa wea stop for worship no againstim samting olketa bilivim, bat olketa needim encouragement nomoa. Mifala trae for strongim and sapotim olketa wea wikdaon olsem. (1 Thessalonica 5:14; Jude 22) Sapos datfala man laekem eniwan for helpem hem, olketa elder and olketa narawan tu bae offerim spiritual help.—Galatia 6:1; 1 Peter 5:1-3.
Nomata olsem, olketa elder no garem paoa for forcem samwan for gohed olsem wanfala Jehovah’s Witness. Evri man wanwan nao garem raet for disaedem wanem hem bae duim. (Joshua 24:15) Long tingting bilong mifala, olketa wea worshipim God mas willing for duim datwan, and mas worshipim hem from heart bilong olketa.—Psalm 110:3; Matthew 22:37.

Ambae MP i ko bak long kavman
Wan Ambae Memba blong Palemen i joinem bak Kavman long wik ia folem politikol party we hemi kontes long hem.
Vice Presiden blong National United Party, Honoroble Silas Bule, i talem se polisi blong pati i stetem se taem wan Memba blong Palemen blong pati i vot akensem pati, hemi wan serious mata blong dil wetem.
John Still Tariqwetu i pefomem wan kastom seremoni long Huarere studio long Port Vila blong klinim fes mo pis blong jonem bak pati afta we i joinem Opposition folem politikol situasen long kaontri.
Mr Bule i talem se National Executive blong National United Party i akseptem kastom seremoni ia mo welkamem bak MP John Still Tariqwetu.
Hemi talem se komiti blong pati i hop se MP John Still Tariqwetu i joinem kavman saed long Palemen long nekis wik.
Ralph Regenvanu, Opposition Lida, i talem se hemi nokat eni toktok blong talem mbe hemi askem kavman blong ariap wetem apil kes blong olgeta from pipol blong Vanuatu i wet.
Exekutiv blong National United Party blong Ambae inkludum tu NUP kaonsela blong Penama provinsol kavman i bin travel i kam long Port Vila mo putum bak MP Tariqwetu long National United Party.

Ofis blong Praem Minista hemi reiteretem bakeken se Pilote we Opposition i stap tokbaot hemi wan kwalifaed pilote.
Ol document we i ofis blong Praem Minista i kat, i shoem se hemi kwalifae blong flaem ol commercial flight.
Ofis blong Praem Minista i talem se Pilote we Opposition i stap refer long hem, hemi passem saksesfuli accrobatic TEST blong hem, mo ino hem wan nomo we hemi saksessfuli passem pepa blong hemi save fly, from i kat wan nara pilot blong Pentecost mo narawan tu blong Tanna.
Olgeta trifala pilote ia oli bin risaen long Air Vanuatu folem nomo rabis condition blong work, mekem se 2 fala nara pilot i ko flaem plane long Kiribas.
ofis blong Praem Minista i talem se Pilote blong Tanna i kasem bak kantri finis, wael, pilote blong Pentecost hemi kam naoia Jif Pilote long Kiribas.
Ofis blong Praem Minista i talem se Praem Minista hemi no interfer long Air Vanuatu.
Hemi talem se Pilote ia i kobak wok long Air Vanuatu wetem ol nara Pilote folem nomo decision blong ol shea Holder blong Air vanuatu long last yia wetem Council blong ol Minister.
Long last yia, ol shea holder wetem Council blong Minista oli agri, se any position we i stap long Air Vanuatu we eni man Vanuatu i save okupaem oli mas lokalaesem.
Folem decision ia, Board of directors blong Air Vanuatu naoia, hemi stap blong karem bak ol pilote we oli bin finisim stadi blong olgeta, be oli no save flyem Air Vanuatu from i nokat place blong olgeta.

m Isaac?— Rebekah savve Jehovah sendem Eliezer for kam. So taem famili bilong Rebekah askem sapos hem laek for go long Canaan and maritim Isaac, hem sei: ‘Ia, mi laek for go.’ Then hem go witim Eliezer nao. Taem olketa kasem Canaan, hem maritim Isaac.

Long yia 30, taem ol tri oli stap putum flaoa, Jisas i go long Jerusalem. Plante man oli kam blong mekem lafet blong Pasova. Long lafet ya, oli bonem ol anamol blong mekem sakrefaes long haos blong God. Samfala oli karem ol anamol ya i kam wetem olgeta, be sam oli pem long Jerusalem.
Taem Jisas i go long haos blong God, hem i luk we ol man oli stap salem ol anamol blong winim mane. ?Hem i mekem wanem? Hem i tekem sam rop mo i mekem wan wip long hem. Nao hem i ronemaot ol sipsip mo ol buluk long haos blong God, mo i kafsaedem ol tebol blong ol man we oli stap jenisim mane, i sakem ol mane blong olgeta i go olbaot. Jisas i talem long ol man we oli stap salem ol pijin se: ‘!Yufala i tekemaot ol samting ya! !Yufala i no mekem haos blong Papa blong mi i kam ples blong mekem maket!’
Ol man oli sapraes long samting we Jisas i mekem. Ol disaepol blong hem oli tingbaot profet tok we i tokbaot Mesaea se: ‘Mi mi wantem tumas we evri samting long haos blong Jehova oli mas stret gud.’
Long yia 33, Jisas i ronemaot ol man bakegen long haos blong God. Hem i wantem se ol man oli mas respektem haos blong Papa blong hem.

CHINA NA OL ASIA KANTRI I REDI LONG JEKIM SARS.
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, June 2) - China na ol kantri blong South East Asia ibin tok orait long kamapim moa wok long lukluk gut long dispela sik SARS.
Dispela i min olsem ol pipol em ol laik raun igo long ol arapela kantri imas kisim jek long "temeratures" blong ol na pulumapim ol helt pepa oa "declaration fom".
Dispela tingting,i hap blong SARS quarantine plan am gavaman blong China na ol memba blong ASEAN ibin tok orait long en.
Wokabout blong ol pipol long Asia ibin bungim bikpela bagarap stat long taim sik SARS ibin kamap igo bikpela raun long ol kantri blong wol long mun March.
Minista blong Quarantine blong China,LiChangjiang ibin tok nau emi gutpela long ol pipol blong narapela kantri iken igo raun long kantri blong em.
Emi tok dispela tingting China ibin bihainim long stopim SARS i kalap igo long ol arapela kantri istap klostu ibin moa gutpela.
Mr.Li ibin tok em iken tokim ol arapela kantri olsem emi gutpela nau long igo lukluk raun long Beijing.
Em ibin mekim dispela toktok insait long wanpela miting wantaim ol memba kantri blong Association blong South East Asia.
June 2, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra

MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, June 19) - Wanpela bikpela saspekt long Bali boming i tok, polis bilong Indonesia ibin tok-lukaut long "torture" oa bagarapim bodi bilong em, long traim long mekim em tok olsem Muslim lotu lida Abu Bakar Bashir ibin brukim loa.

I tru ol no nap pruvim olsem Bashir ibin halivim long ol Bali boming em bin kilim 202 pipol long mun Oktoba long yar igo pinis, tasol polis i tok, ol dispela bomingi wanpela "operation" oa wok bilong Jemaah Islamiyah.

FAIFPELA SOLDIA BILONG AMERICA I DAI
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, Jul 27) - Ol ibin kilim narapela faifpela soldia bilong America insait long Iraq aninit long 24 haua.
Gina Wilkinson i ripot, ol ino stop long pait igo long ol soldia bilong America bihain long ol i bin kilim tupela pikinini man bilong Saddam Hussein long wik igo pinis.
Insait long nupela birua, ol i bin kilim wanpela US marine na narapela i bin kisim bagarap long bodi, taim sampela pipal ibin hait stap na pait igo long ol long southern Iraq.
Long narapela birua ken, ol ibin kilim wanpela soldia na tupela ibin kisim bagarap long bodi long west bilong kapital, taim ol ibin pait igo long wanpelaEngineering Unit.
Ol ibin pait wantaim ol liklik gan, rocket probelled grenades na ating ol bom ol pipal iet ibin wokim long haus bilong ol.
Tripela soldia ibin dai insait long taim wanpela Grenade ibnin pairap long wanpela Children's Hospital, em ol i gad long en insait long Baqubah taun, samting olsem fifti kilomita long north bilong Baghdad.
Tenpela (10) soldia i dai pinis bihain lnog ol soldia bilong America ibin kilim Uday na Qusay Hussein long wik igo pinis, na ol Koalisan Foses nau i stap redi na was gut tru long bekim bek bilong ol sapotas bilong Saddam Hussein.
July 28, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra

Truf ova long Not Vanuatu
I kat wan truf system i silip ova long Not pat blong Vanuatu we hemi cros i ko daon long Fiji mo hemia nao i mekem smol ren mo tanda.
Duty Weta Forecaster long Weta Ofis, Ian Nelson i talem long VBTC Nius.
“Long ol nara ples, ples i klaod mo janis blong smol ren; Ol wind blong yumi i variable ova long Not mo ol nara pat blong kaontri i expektem Saot East Wind,” Mr Nelson i talemaot.
“Hemia nao weta we kaontri i sud expektem long tete. Truf bae i stap ova long wiken ia kasem long nekis wik.”
Saeklon outlook blong faev dei hemi low,” Mr Nelson i talemaot.

Krowesia
Krowesia (Tok Inglis: Croatia, Tok Krowesia: Hrvatska) em i wanpela kantri long Yurop. Kapitol na nambawan bigpela taun tumas bilong dispela kantri em i Zagreb. Tokples bilong Krowesia em i Tok Krowesia. Krowesia i gat 20 kaunti, olsem provins, na biktaun Zagreb, na bikpela bilong en em i 56.594 km2. Em i gat klaimet bilong Solwara bilong Graun long namel (Tok Inglis: Mediterranean Sea) na kontinen. Solwara bilong Krowesia em i gat mo long 1000 ailan. Krowesia i gat 4,290,612 manmeri na lotu bilong planti manmeri em i lotu Kristen (Katolik).
Long taim bifo Krowesia em i hap bilong Yugoslavia. Long yia 1991 taim Krowesia i bin kamap olsem wanpela independen kantri. Bihain long 1995 i no bin gat pait namel long Krowesia na Sebia.
Krowesia em i wanwan memba kantri bilong Yunaitid Neishins, NATO, WTO, CEFTA na Kaunsil bilong Yurop. Bihain long yia 2013 Krowesia em bai memba bilong Yunion bilong Yurop.

Mi wari stret long wanpela lotu i laik spredim skul bilong ol hia long Papua Niugini. Ol save kolim ol yet olsem Sios bilong Kraist (Church of Christ). Ol i kam long kantri Filipin na nem bilong ol long tok ples bilong ol yet em Iglesia ni Cristo. Man husat bin wokim dispela sios em wanpela man i dai pinis bipo, nem bilong em Felix Manalo.
Bilong wanem mi wari? Dispela sios em wanpela sios i nogut olgeta. Mi harim long sampela pren bilong mi, em ol man na meri Filipin, olsem Sios bilong Kraist bilong Manalo, em save mekim kain kain pasin i no stret long kantri bilong ol yet. Olsem na mi raitim dispela bilong givim tok lukaut long olgeta wankantri bilong yumi. Yumi noken pas long sios bilong Manalo. Yumi noken joinim ol. Yumi ken tok strong long ol famili na ol pren bilong yumi olsem tu.
Internet i pulap long olgeta kain evidens agens long sios bilong ol. Wanpela pren bilong mi, em stretim na lainim olgeta samting insait long wanpela blog, link bilong em i olsem:
Yumi ken lukim na ritim gut sios bilong Manalo em wanem kain sios.
Sapos yumi laikim tru sol bilong yumi wantaim olgeta famili na pren na wankantri bilong yumi, bai yumi no larim wanpela i joinim sios bilong Manalo!

Oposisen i kwestem niu posisen long labour
Oposisen i talem se jenis long Trade Dispute Act bae i kostem Labour Ofis bigfala mani.
Jenis long act ia hemi blong putum wan adjudicator olsem wan niufala posisen we bae i stap long Labour ofis.
Niufala jenis ia i pas long Palamen long wik ia.
Mbe Lida blong Oposisen, Ralph Regenvanu i askem Kavman blong gat mo consultation long niufala jenis ia.
Wok blong adjudicator ia hemi blong lukluk long ol dispute we i hapen bitwin wan wokman mo emploia.

Niufala posisen ia hemi blong faev yia contrak mo Judicial Seves Komisen nao bae hemi jusum folem rekomendesen we i kam long minista responsibol.

Black Diamond FC hemi stap askem olgeta fan blong go sapotem hem long wiken ya taem oli disaedem top blong klasmen blong Port Vila Football Association fes divisen.

?FROM WANEM I IMPOTEN? Blong Jehova i glad long wan man, man ya i mas givim laef blong hem long Jehova mo i baptaes. ?YU MEKEM OLSEM WANEM?
Taem yutufala i stadi long wan haf, i gud yu tokbaot olsem wanem haf ya i soemaot ol fasin blong Jehova. Mo tu, yu leftemap tingting blong Baebol stadi blong i ridim Baebol evridei, mo i prea “oltaem.”
—1Te 5:17; Jem 4:8 I gud yu leftemap tingting blong Baebol stadi blong i putum mak blong baptaes. Yu save givhan long hem tu blong kasem ol mak olsem, givim ansa long miting, prij long ol famle, mo ol man long ples blong wok. Yu mas tingbaot se Jehova i no fosem man blong i mekem wok blong hem. Baptaes hem i desisen blong wanwan man.
—Du 30:19, 20 Pulum Baebol stadi blong i mekem sam jenis long laef, blong i save mekem Jehova i glad mo tekem baptaes. (Ef 4:22-24) Yu save tokbaot haf ya “Baebol i jenisim laef blong man” we i stap kamaot long ol Wajtaoa
Tokbaot glad we yu kasem taem yu mekem wok blong Jehova.
—Aes 48:17, 18

Ol yut i askem help blong wok
Kol blong kat moa wok long kaontri blong ol yut i save daonem plante problem long street.
Yut Representative blong Blacksands eria long Port Vila, Amos Pakoa i talem long VBTC Nius se hemi wan ples we plante problem i kamaot long hem.
“Hemi sud helpem mifala blong faenem wok. Hemia blong mifala i save wok from fulap long mifala i stap nomo olsem. Taem Friday olsem oli drink ale blokem ol man long rod askem mani,” Mr Pakoa i talem.
“So sapos oli faenem wan wei blong putum ol yut i ko long wok mi tink bae fasin ia stop.”
Mama, Rachel Vira i talem se naoia rispek we ol pikinini i sud kat long ol mama mo Papa i nomo kat.
“Mi stap luk long sam, taem papa mo mama i toktok hemi anda bak, so bae yumi mekem olsem wanem? Yumi stap long wan living naoia we i difren
Wan long olgeta lokol Bisnisman long Port Vila, Lopez Adams i talem seh kavman i sud neva kivim wok mbe hemi sud helpem environmen blong kaontri blong hemi invitem ol binis hemi save gro mo ol niu bisnis tu oli save ko insaed.
“Kavman wanem we hemi sud mekem hemi blong helpem Private Sector blong inkrisim bisnis. Mo taem yumi kat plante bisnis, yumi kat moa wok,” Mr Lopez i talem.
“Ol bisnis long Private sekta nao i sud kivim moa wok mbe from loa blong kavman tru long ol dipatmen i mekem i moa tuff.”
by Patience Mawa.

PARADISEC
Australia i stap namel long planti kain kain tok ples na kalsa long Pasifik. I gat moa long 2000 tok ples long Australia, Pasifik, na PNG. Long PNG yet i gat 900 tok ples samting. Tasol nogut planti long ol dispela tok ples bai lus long 100 yia bihain samting. Long PARADISEC mipela no gat tru rikoding long ol dispela tokples. Na tu ol rikoding mipela i gat i no karimapim olgeta samting long wanpela tok ples. Olsem na, no gat rikoding long olgeta stori, olgeta save long wokim kain kain 
... (761 chars skipped) ... 

Sampela ol dispela rikoding i stap long tep o kaset, tasol nau ol tep i bagarap pinis na mipela no inap harim nau. Bikwin, guria, o tsunami i ken bagarapim ol tep olsem na ol stori i stap long ol bai lus olgeta. Olgeta rikoding bilong mipela i gat toksave i tok klia long ol wanem manmeri i ken mekim wanem samting long ol dispela rikoding. Sampela rikoding em olgeta manmeri i ken harim na yusim, tasol sampela arapela i gat tambu na yu mas kisim tok orait long mipela bipo yu ken harim.

An Archaeology of Early Christianity in Vanuatu
Long 1839, John Williams ibin fol daon long Dillon’s Bay long Erromango. Ded blong hem wetem James Harris ibin jenjim histri blong New Hebrides big wan. Afta samting ia, taem blong ol fes misnari we oli bin kam long ol aelans blong saot ibin stat. Ol misnari ibin kam long New Hebrides, mo fulup man mo woman ibin kam insaed long jioj. Be hemi long taem we ol man oli faetim jioj olsem. Sam man ibin mixim jioj wetem kastom olsem. Histri blong jioj lon
... (1109 chars skipped) ... 
lian Nasonal University (ANU) i bin mekem tugeta. Oli bin wok long Erromango mo Tanna. Oli bin lukaotem ol olfala ples blong ol misnaris mo man ples long 1800s. Oli bin lukim long sam kastom mo tabu saets olsem blong save wanem ol bilif blong ol man ples bifo ol misnari ibin kam long New Hebrides. Oli bin dig long graon long faev haos blong misnari (tu long Tanna, mo tri long Erromango), mo oli bin dig long wan kastom vilej blong bifo long Tanna. Afta, oli bin kaontim evri smol pis blong ol samt
... (1109 chars skipped) ...
stom even long taem we fulup samting ibin jenj long aelan blong olgeta. Fulup man ibin ko long jioj, be ol man mo woman istap kipim sam samting blong kastom, olsem ol danis, bilif, tabu ston, mo ol narfala samting we hemi wan pat blong kastom. Bigfala tingting blong projek i olsem: Christianity ino bin kaekae kastom. Kastom ibin kaekae Christianity, mo kastom istap strong yet long Vanuatu tidae. Christianity, hemi bin kam wan pis blong kastom blong planti man mo woman long Vanutau.

Dipatmen blo Eneji (DoE) hemi wok klosap wetem SSP-Vanuatu lo saed blo pricing blo fuel and mifala I wantem letem pablik I save lo wan praes jenis we ba I happen lo tis manis Maj.
Stat lo namba 13 lo Manis Maj, 2022, 1 lita blo mazut lo retail fuel outlets (seves stesens) ba i stap lo 183 VT/Lita. Hemia I lukim wan inkris blo 23 VT/Litre long praes blo naoia we hemi stap lo 160 VT/Litre.
Price blo benzene lo seves stetsens I stap nomo olsem 173 VT/Litre. Hemi nokat jens lo praes blo benzene be ba hemia I save jenis lo manis Eprel.
Yumi save luk ol praes istap inkres lo ol taem I kam from rison blo COVID-19 pandemic we I afektem oil praes lo Europe, U.S.A, Asia mo Asia-Pacific. Praes blo fuel mo gas I kontinue blo inkris lo wol mo Vanuatu ino exempt. Yu save luk lo graph fasin we petroleum fuel praes I stap go antap nomo since Januari mo Februari2022 compare lo yia 2021. Lo ol manis we I kam yumi save experiensem ol praes ia I save go antap moa folem event blo Russia-Ukraine war we i stap gohed naoia long Europe.
Dipatmen blo Eneji I stap advasem pablik se wetem outluk blo praes lo petroleum prodakt mo outbreak blo COVID-19 lo Efate, ol users blo fuel I sud execisem gudfala jajmen taem oli pem mo usum fuel we bai no afectem badjet blo olgeta mo save daonem usej blo fuel.
Pablik I save kontaktem Dipatmen blo Eneji wetem queries lo saed blo price inkris ia lo DoE Petroleum Officer tru lo DoE kontakt adres ia: Tel: 25201 o mobael: 7760842 o e-mail:

Twenty faev kandidet-Torba Provinsiol eleksen
Twenty faev kandidet blong kontestem 2021 Torba Provincial Eleksen long December.
Jeaman blong Electoral Commission, Edward Kaltamat, i talem se komisen i mit mo agri blong eleksen deit i stil stap long December 7.
Vanuatu Electoral Commission i bin ridim nem blong ol kwalifae kandidet long Monday eli wik ia long Radio Vanuatu mo politikol kampaign i stat tu long yestete.
Mr Kaltamat i talem se folem loa blong eleksen, afta long namba december 5, ol posta blong ol kandidet i mas ko daon mo impoten wan nao ol posta kolosap long wan polling stesen.
Hemi talem se long taem blong polling dei, hemi tabu blong pipol i werem ol t-shirt blong ol kandidet blong ko vot.
Mr Kaltamat i talem se naoia evri poltikol pati we oli kontestem provinsiol eleksen ia oli mas stat kampaign vinis.
VBTC Nius i andastandem se wetem lojistik arenjmen ia, politikol kampein bae i hapen long wan wik nomo mo bae i finis long Monday nekis wik.
Tiusde nekis wik hemi pablik holidei blong Torba blong ol pipol i ko long vot blong jusum ol provinsiol kaonsela blong olgeta.
Politikol kampaign bae i en long long midol naet long December 5.

Tu bisi eapot long New Zealand i pripea from travel babol
Tu long ol bisi eapot blong New Zealand oli stap mekem ol plan rere from wan intanasonal travel babol sapos we New Zealand Kavman i anaonsem wan.
Radio New Zealand i ripotem se Auckland Eapot bambae hem i dividem operesen blong hem blong save alaoem eni travel we i kam insaed mo ko aot long Cook Islands. Wellington Eapot bae hem i separetem tu ol flaea blong hem.
Travel babol bae i mekem se Auckland mo Wellington Eapot bae i divide i kam tu. Wan bae hem i safe zone blong ol COVID fri travela mo nara wan bae hem i contained zone blong ol pipol we oli kambak long eni ples raon long wol we i gat COVID kes long hem.
New Zealand Aviation Coalition Co-chair, Justin Tighe-Umbers, i talem se nomata we Kavman i no talem stret long ol statemen blong hem, mbe ol eapot ia oli stap mekem fulap wok finis blong redi sapos we kavman i mekem kol blong oli open.
Expat Kiwi Engineer we i live long Fiji, Geoff Cable, hem i talem se plante long ol Pacific Island oli COVID fri mo oli afekted bigwan we naoia oli nokat akses long turis mo specialist blong New Zealand.
Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern hem i no soem eni saen blong kat intanasonal babol yet .
Hem i talem se, eni disisen we bae hem i tekem bae hem i tingting plante wetem kea, abaot sefti blong New Zealand mo Pacific.

HAROLD KEKE I LAREM FRI FOAPELA PIPOL MO
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, July 7) - Solomon Islands rebel, Harold Keke i larem fri sampela hostage - ol pipol em ibin holim kalabus bihainim wanpela ceasefire.
Dispela ol foapela pipol nau igo pinis long kepital, Honiara long ol ibin larem ol igo fri long Weathercoast blong Guadalcanal.
Shane McLeod i ripot kam long Honiara olsem Harold Keke ino bin sainim Solomons 2000 Townsville peace agrimen, tasol em ibin sainim wanpela ceasefire oa stop-pait long wik-end wantaim wanpela tokman blong gaman.
Keke ibin larem fri foapela pipol, husait i wanpela hap blong ol wokman blong Anglican Sios, em ibin holim kalabus sampela mun igo pinis.
Stop-fait agrimen i kamap taim Solomon Islands Gavna Gneral i wanbel long tingting blong Kebinet long askim halvim blong ol soldia na polis, em Australia bai igo pas longen.
Palimen bai vout long en taim em i bung long Tunde.
July 7, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra

Sidarta
Sidarta (Siddharta Gautama, o Buddha Gautama) i man bilong India. Em i stap long India 2500 yia bipo. Planti man o meri ol i kolim "Buda" tasol.
Dispela man i bin stat budisim, o lotu bilong ol Buda.
Mama bilong Sidarta i karim long India long yia samting olsem 563 bipo Kraist. Em i dai pinis taim i gat 80 krismas.
Igat planti olpela stori long Sidarta, o Buda. Ating sampela stori i tru na sampela stori i no tru. Tasol, manmeri bilong toksave histori, o toksave long taim bipo tru, ol i t
... (197 chars skipped) ... 
 Sidarta i no bungim wanpela trabel yet. Tasol taim Sidarta i kamap 29 krismas em i wok autsait long haus bilong king na i lukim 4pela samting: em i lukim olpela man, sikpela man, man i dai pinis, na gutpela man i gat no haus. Long dispela taim igo, Sidarta i tingting long dispela foapela samting tasol. I no ken hamamas yet.
Olrait em i lusim haus long king na em i go long bus. Em i bungim narapela man ol i traim painim hamamas long pasin asetik. Dispela i min ol i laik kaikai liklik tru, na ol 
... (197 chars skipped) ...
ongpela taim tru. Em i wokim wokim meditesen. Meditesen em i pasin i sindaun long graun na i no tok, na i painim hamamas insait long en. Olrait wanpela de em i sidaun long diwai na em i painim pinis enlaitmen. Enlaitmen i min dispela man o meri i no gat wanpela trabel yet insait long het bilongen. I gat hamamas tru tumas. Nau ol i kolim dispela diwai diwai bilong enlaitmen.
Long dispela taim Sidarta i painim pinis ol save ol i kolim foapela tok tru. Ol i as bilong budisim, o lotu bilong ol Buda.

Wan consultation long saed blong Ban blong diaper, i harem se sapos reusable diaper hemi only option blong usum, bai hemi kat plante negative effect long olketa woman.
Consultation ya i harem se olketa woman bai oli kat extra work sapos gavman i bannem diaper, mo olketa woman we oli olketa single mama mo only bread winner long ol family bai oli no save mitim cost blong water, electricity, cost blong pem reusable diaper mo bai oli no save pem housegel blong lukaotem ol baby blong olketa.
Consultation ya we itekem ples blong Vanuatu Chamber blong Commerce mo Industry i harem long olketa discussion we itekem ples se, long Vanuatu main issue wetem diaper hemi wea ples blong sakem ol toti diaper long hem.
Olketa consultation we istap tekem ples naoia hemi folem nomo plan blong gavman blong bannem diaper long Vanuatu stat long December yia ya.

1. Pasin nogut i kirap olsem wanem?
Pasin nogut i kirap long graun taim Satan i mekim namba 1 tok giaman. Pastaim, Satan i wanpela gutpela ensel, tasol “em i no holimpas tok i tru.” (Jon 8:44) Em i no laik bai ol man i lotu long God—em i laik ol i mas lotu long em. Satan i giamanim namba 1 meri, Iv, na grisim em long bihainim tok bilong em na sakim tok bilong God. Adam tu i bihainim Iv na sakim tok. Disisen bilong Adam i kamapim pen na hevi na indai.

ap bilong ol man i kamapim klia dispela samting. Ol bikman bilong gavman i no inap pinisim woa, pasin raskol, pasin i no stret, na sik.
Wok bos bilong God i helpim ol man husat i daun long en, tasol wok bos bilong ol man i no olsem. (Aisaia 48:17, 18) Klostu nau Jehova bai pinisim olgeta gavman bilong graun. Ol manmeri i stap aninit long wok bos bilong God, ol bai kisim graun na stap long en.—Aisaia 11:9.

Pasin laikim bilong God i kamapim klia olsem, tru tru em bai pinisim pasin nogut na ol pen na hevi. Ol manmeri husat i bilip olsem wok bos bilong God i stret na ol i makim em olsem Bos bilong ol, ol bai amamas na stap oltaim long graun.

Saikoanalisis
Saikoanalisis(Tok Siamani: Psychoanalyse) i wanpela lain bilong Saikolosi. Manmeri bilong saikoanalisis tingting ol man o meri igat nid o drive ol i wantim samting, na pawa bilong olgeta drive i mekim manmeri wokim olgeta samting ol i wok. Bikpela bilong dispela lain long saikoanalisis i Sigmund Freud. Freud i statim pinis dispela lain long saikolosi. Narapela bikpela long saikoanalisis i Carl Jung, Jacques Lacan, Alfred Adler, Slavoj Zizek na planti mo.
Planti manmeri long saikoanalisis tingting narakain samting i givim manmeri dispela nid o drive. Long Freud em i seks, long narapela manmeri em i narapela kain samting.

Vanuatu blong selebratem 40 yia independence anivesari
Hemi toktok blong Praem Minista, Bob Loughman long fes ordinary sitting blong Palamen long wik ia ”Nomata long COVID -19, Vanuatu bae i selebratem dei ia mo selebresen bae i stap long everi aelan blong yumi.”
“Mo long everi aria kaonsel,” hemi talem.
“Hemi taem blong yumi selebratem olketa developmen ajivmen mo jalens we yumi ko tru long hem sins 1980 i kam kasem tete.”
Long sem taem, komiti blong 40 yia aniversari tugeta wetem Port Vila Municipal i mekem wan kwik kol blong olketa bisnis mo praevet haos raon long Port Vila mo tu raon long kaontri blong mekem klin ap.
Nasonal kodineita blong 40 yia independence aniversari, Fred Samuel i talem se kaontri i majua nao mo ol man i sud tekem responsibiliti blong stap klin ap oltaem.
Peter Sakita, Town klak blong Port Vila Municipal i talem se oli wok tugeta wetem independens komiti blong putum aot notis long ol bisnis haos blong mekem klin ap.
Hemi talem se “Mifala tu i pat long 40 yia aniversari mo mesej i ko long ol komuniti blong paintem ol bilding, ol lokol oli katem grass mo kilim yard.”
Kodinata blong Independence Komiti, Mr Samuel i stresem se “Strik COVID -19 rul bae i aplae long everi ples we selebresen i stap long hem long kaontri.”
“Bae i kat ol baket blong wan wan man i mas pratisim han washing long hem.
“Social distancing bae hemi wan jalens blong adresem mbe i depen plante nao long olketa man blong aplaem.”

Vanuatu tenis i gat wan yang tim we bambae i go difendem kala blong Vanuatu long Pacific Games long Samoa.
Insaed long tim ia i gat two female studen we bae i mekem fes apierens blong tufala long Pacific Games we hemi biggest kem long Oceania rijen.
Tufala ia i gat Desiree Signo mo Daisy Sibiti mo tufala i stap skul long Port Vila.
Hed blong Vanuatu Tennis i preisem komitmen we ol pleia ia i soem long trening afta we oli bin anaonsem tim long las yia.
Tufala yang female pleia i talem se oli akseptem ofa blong part long tim from long Pacific Mini Games long Port Vila long 2017, i gat sam tenis pleia we oli 14 yia nomo be oli winim medal long nem blong kantri.
Ol home base pleia oli tren anda long supavisen blong niu teknikel daerekta, Ian Honila we i kam long Solomon Islands.

Atikel ia bae hemi tokbaot prosess blong ligel adopsen, olsem wanem blong adoptem wan pikinini, wanem ifect blong wan ligel adopsen mo olsem wanem blong aplae from wan ligel adoptsen. Ligel adopsen mo kastom adopsen hemi tu difren samting.
Mediasen hemi wan fasin blong solvem problem aotsaet long Kot. Jaj i save askem long ol man we oli kat wan kes long Kot blong oli solvem problem blong olgeta tru long mediasen. Be from se mediasen hemi wan volentari prosess, ol man we oli kat wan kes long Kot oli save agri long hem o disaet se no oli wantem continu nomo wetem Kot blong olgeta long Kot. Bifo wan kes i go long mediasen, ol man long tugeta saet blong Kes i mas agri long hem.
Yu kat raet mo yu fri blong riprisentem yu wan long Kot sapos yu no kat loia. Be yu mas andestanem tu se bae hemi hat lelebet from yu no kat fulap save long saet blong loa olsem wan loia. Be maet yu wantem mekem olsem from yu nokat inaf mani blong pem wan loia o from yu bin kat wan rabis expiriens wetem wan loia bifo.
Topic ia hemia bigwan tumas mo bae yumi no save tokbaot evriwan. Atikol ia bae hemi tokbaot nomo ol impoten aspek blong responsabiliti we wan loia i kat i go klaen blong hem mo wanem wan klaen i save mekem taem loia blong hem i no fulfilim responsabiliti ia. Responsabiliti ia oli kolem “Profesionel etiks”
Evri wok we wan loia i mekem i kat fi blong hem. Be taem wan loia i sendem wan invoes i go long wan klaen, maet fulap oli no save olsem wanem nao loia i stap preparem ol invoes ia.

Malon Rasu, Area Secretary blong East Malo, i talem se Save the Children i bin kivimaot tu ol barb wire long ol komuniti ia blong oli fensem ol karen blong olgeta from ol wild pig oli stap kosem tu bigfala damej long ol karen kakae blong ol pipol long east Malo.
Ol 11 communities ia long east Malo, i gat Nalivuhaivanua, Alowaru, Tabunveresake, Atariboe, Afnarara, Aliaboe, Genesis, Ambahura, Navioro, Tanmial mo Amapelao.

Olketa Jehovah’s Witness duim wanfala Bible study program wea ansarem staka kwestin. Samfala kwestin hem:
Hu nao God?
Waswe, God tingim mi?
Hao nao mi savve stap gud witim marit partner bilong mi?
Wanem samting nao savve mekem mi hapi?
Long daon iu savve lukim ansa for olketa kwestin wea staka pipol askem abaotem Bible study program bilong mifala.
Hao nao iufala studyim Bible witim man? Mifala chusim eni subject olsem “God” or “marit” and then storyim olketa scripture long Bible abaotem datwan. 
... (179 chars skipped) ... 
m Bible witim pipol, mifala iusim buk Wanem Nao Really Samting wea Bible Teachim? Disfala buk storyim plande subject long kliafala wei. Samfala subject hia hem samting wea Bible teachim abaotem God, Jesus, and future bilong iumi.
Waswe, eni kost for datfala Bible study? Bible study hem free nomoa, and mifala no kostim buk wea mifala iusim tu.
Hao long nao each study? Staka pipol savve studyim Bible for wan hour evri week. Bat datwan hem no wanfala rul. Mifala savve change for fitim living bilong
... (179 chars skipped) ...
dem tu-thri minute nomoa for showim iu study program bilong mifala. Sapos iu laekem, iu savve gohed long datfala study.
Sapos mi studyim Bible witim iufala, waswe, datwan minim mi mas kamap wanfala Jehovah’s Witness tu? Nomoa. Olketa Jehovah’s Witness laekem tumas for teachim pipol abaotem Bible, bat mifala nating forcem pipol for joinim religion bilong mifala. Mifala storyim nomoa samting wea Bible talem, and luksavve evriwan garem raet for chusim samting wea hem laek for bilivim.—1 Peter 3:15.

Han blong God
—i mekem, sevem, mo helpem yumi
Baebol i samtaem tokbaot "han blong God" mo wanem han blong God ya i save mekem. Long lesen ya, bambae yumi tingbaot trifala samting we han blong God i save makem.
Be fastaem mi tok smol longsaed blong God we hem i spirit nomo, nao i nogat han olsem man. Jisas i talem se, "God hem i Spirit" (Jon 4:24). Nao tu, Jisas i talem se, "wan spirit i no gat mit mo bun blong hem," (Luk 24:39).
Naoia, Tok ya, "han blong God", hem i min se paoa blong God. God i 
... (1162 chars skipped) ... 
lgeta, i winim paoa blong evri narafala god o spirit. Mo God i gat wan Pikininy, Jisas Kraes, we paoa blong hem i stap sem mak blong God we i Papa blong hem.
"Kraes ya, yumi save luk hem. Hem i sem mak long God we yumi no save luk hem. Hem nomo i stret Pikinini blong God, mo hem i stamba blong olgeta samting we God i mekem..." (Kolosi 1:15-20).
2 Han blong God i Sevem Yumi blong Panis from Sin
Baebol i talem se God i stap sevem yumi long gladhat blong hem (Efesas 2:8-10). God i bin sanem pikinin
... (1162 chars skipped) ...
o save livim yu yu stap yu wan. Bambae mi mi no save lego yu samtaem. Nao from samting ya, yumi save mekem tingting blong yumi strong blong talem se, 'Hae God i stap givhan long mi, nao bambae mi mi no save fraet. Man i no save mekem wan samting blong spolem mi.'" (Hibrus 13:5-6).
Bambae God i save helpem yumi olsem we hem i helpem David finis, i King blong Israel. Hem i talem se, "Hae God i stap lukaot gud long mi olsem we mi mi sipsip blong hem, nao mi no save sot long wan samting" (Sam 23:1).

INAP tupela mun bihain long ol Israel i bin lusim Isip, ol i kamap long maunten Sainai, ol i kolim tu maunten Horep. Em dispela ples bipo God i bin toktok wantaim Moses long diwai i paia. Ol Israel i sanapim haus sel bilong ol na sindaun inap liklik taim.
Moses i go antap long maunten na ol Israel i wet daunbilo. Antap long maunten, Jehova i tokim Moses olsem Em i laik bai ol Israel i mas bihainim tok bilong Em na bai ol i kamap lain bilong Em. Taim Moses i lusim maunten na i go daun, em i tokim
... (771 chars skipped) ... 
spela lo mi laik bai ol manmeri i bihainim.’ Olsem na Moses i go antap gen long maunten. Em i stap inap 40 de na 40 nait.
God i givim planti lo long ol manmeri bilong em. Moses i raitim ol dispela lo. Na tu, God i givim dispela tupela hap ston long Moses. Long ol dispela ston, God yet i bin raitim dispela Tenpela Lo long en.
